00104 // reimplemented (ISerializable)
00105 
00106 template <typename Value>
00107 bool TAttribute<Value>::Serialize(iser::IArchive& archive)
00108 {
00109        bool retVal = true;
00110 
00111        static iser::CArchiveTag valueTag("Value", "Value of attribute");
00112        retVal = retVal && archive.BeginTag(valueTag);
00113 
00114        retVal = retVal && archive.Process(m_value);
00115 
00116        retVal = retVal && archive.EndTag(valueTag);
00117 
00118        return retVal;
00119 }
